line_1: Can't reach those Depths, or raise the settled Ooze;
line_2: The deepest Waves, and fiercest Wind that blows,

line_1: But faintly strike, and catch the yielding Ooze.
line_2: Till weary'd Arms their toilsome Work refuse,

line_1: The reeking Blood shines on the redden'd Ooze,
line_2: And blushing Waves their smiling Azure lose.

line_1: When laid (said he) to soak in Ooze.
line_2: This Sprunt its Pertness sure will lose
